content: TE-Y/S BH Bushing tool heads Universal bushing tool head for surface roughening using SDS Max (TE-Y) and TE-S shanks ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Carbide pins – for smoother surface removal and higher wear resistance Versatile – use the same tool head with Hilti TE-S or TE-Y shanks (available separately) Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Multiple sizes available – helping you to match the bushing tool to the needs of the job Applications Removing excess concrete Roughening concrete surfaces to better receive new coatings For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) and TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers and a compatible shank (available separately) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 2 in Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max), TE-H17 (HEX 17), TE-S Application: Surface preparation Technical Data | Length | 2 in | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max), TE-H17 (HEX 17), TE-S | Application | Surface preparation | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429759 - Bushing head TE-Y/S BH 4x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 1829 - Bushing head TE-Y/S BH 4x4 cm - Package Size 1 pc - 2429819 - Bushing head TE-Y/S BH 6x6 - Package Size 1 pc - 88594 - Bushing head TE-Y/S BH 6x6 cm - Package Size 1 pc
